entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
